H0.text: According to the proverb, what does a stitch in time save. Time

H1.text: According to the proverb, what does a stitch in time save. Effort

H2.text: According to the proverb, what does a stitch in time save. Money

H3.text: According to the proverb, what does a stitch in time save. 9

A4.text: The correct answer to 'According to the proverb, what does a stitch in time save' is 'nine'. The proverb 'A stitch in time saves nine' implies that addressing a problem early prevents greater issues later, which can be interpreted as saving nine problems or efforts.
